Posts.Content: May 14, 2017 07:51AM Tcal-7739 wrote: The length of time between mine was 3 months. I asked to postpone excisional biopsy for about a month to coincide with school vacation week and my surgeon said it was no problem. However, if you're not happy you should find a surgeon you like, regardless.
Posts.Title: ADH Club Chickenpants SarBar22
